thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Anonymous
text: What a joy to have discovered Trusted Housesitters! I now go away leaving the various animals (dogs, chickens & pigs) in the capable hands of whichever Housesitter is staying. I return to find everyone happy & the house neat as a pin. I have no hesitation in recommending TH as a solution for worry free holidays, to say nothing of saving a lot of money on other forms of housesitting.
